data_description.extended_attr: Show extended attributes: wikidata_id, osm_dict, osm_details_dict, wikidata_dict (if they exist). Provides many additional attributes for advanced logic. Warning, this will make the attributes very long!
data_description.use_gps_accuracy: Set this to False if your Device Tracker has a GPS Accuracy (gps_accuracy) attribute, but it always shows 0 even if the latitude and longitude are correct.
